actions.name: AbortDocumentVersionUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to abort the upload of the specified document version that was previously initiated by InitiateDocumentVersionUpload

actions.name: ActivateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to activate the specified user. Only active users can access Amazon WorkDocs

actions.name: AddNotificationPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to add principals that are allowed to call notification subscription APIs for a given WorkDocs site

actions.name: AddResourcePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to create a set of permissions for the specified folder or document

actions.name: AddUserToGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to add a user to a group

actions.name: CheckAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to check an alias

actions.name: CreateComment
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new comment to the specified document version

actions.name: CreateCustomMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more custom properties to the specified resource

actions.name: CreateFolder
actions.description: Grants permission to create a folder with the specified name and parent folder

actions.name: CreateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create an instance

actions.name: CreateLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to add labels to the given resource

actions.name: CreateNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to configure WorkDocs to use Amazon SNS notifications

actions.name: CreateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user in a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory

actions.name: DeactivateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate the specified user, which revokes the user's access to Amazon WorkDocs

actions.name: DeleteComment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified comment from the document version

actions.name: DeleteCustomMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to delete custom metadata from the specified resource

actions.name: DeleteDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently delete the specified document and its associated metadata

actions.name: DeleteDocumentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete versions of a specified document

actions.name: DeleteFolder
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently delete the specified folder and its contents

actions.name: DeleteFolderContents
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the contents of the specified folder

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an instance

actions.name: DeleteLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to delete one or more labels from a resource

actions.name: DeleteNotificationPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to delete principals that are allowed to call notification subscription APIs for a given WorkDocs site

actions.name: DeleteNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified subscription from the specified organization

actions.name: DeleteUser
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified user from a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory

actions.name: DeregisterDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a directory

actions.name: DescribeActivities
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch user activities in a specified time period

actions.name: DescribeAvailableDirectories
actions.description: Grants permission to describe available directories

actions.name: DescribeComments
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the comments for the specified document version

actions.name: DescribeDocumentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the document versions for the specified document

actions.name: DescribeFolderContents
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the contents of the specified folder, including its documents and sub-folders

actions.name: DescribeGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the user groups

actions.name: DescribeInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to describe instances

actions.name: DescribeNotificationPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe principals that are allowed to call notification subscription APIs for a given WorkDocs site

actions.name: DescribeNotificationSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the specified notification subscriptions

actions.name: DescribeResourcePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of a specified resource's permissions

actions.name: DescribeRootFolders
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the root folders

actions.name: DescribeUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the specified users. You can describe all users or filter the results (for example, by status or organization)

actions.name: DownloadDocumentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to download a specified document version

actions.name: GetCurrentUser
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of the current user

actions.name: GetDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified document object

actions.name: GetDocumentPath
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the path information (the hierarchy from the root folder) for the requested document

actions.name: GetDocumentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve version metadata for the specified document

actions.name: GetFolder
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata of the specified folder

actions.name: GetFolderPath
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the path information (the hierarchy from the root folder) for the specified folder

actions.name: GetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for the specified group

actions.name: GetResources
actions.description: Grants permission to get a collection of resources

actions.name: InitiateDocumentVersionUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new document object and version object

actions.name: RegisterDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to register a directory

actions.name: RemoveAllResourcePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to remove all the permissions from the specified resource

actions.name: RemoveResourcePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the permission for the specified principal from the specified resource

actions.name: RestoreDocumentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to restore versions of a specified document

actions.name: SearchResources
actions.description: Grants permission to search metadata and the content of resources

actions.name: UpdateDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified document

actions.name: UpdateDocumentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to change the status of the document version to ACTIVE

actions.name: UpdateFolder
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified folder

actions.name: UpdateInstanceAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to update an instance alias

actions.name: UpdateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified user, and grants or revokes administrative privileges to the Amazon WorkDocs site

actions.name: UpdateUserAdministrativeSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update the administrative settings for a user
